data.name: World Fighting Soccer 22
data.detailed_description:
Experience the thrill of head to head Soccer!

Compete in Local Multiplayer or a Single Player Campaign Mode to decide the world's greatest striker!
A simple control scheme and exciting presentation ensures that everyone can experience the thrill of the Beautiful Game.
Trap, pass, fly through the air, and strike! All with the press of a button!
Execute combos that'll leave defenders speechless and fight your way to the top!

Features

  • Versus Mode: Compete in head to head local multiplayer or against CPU opponents
  • Campaign mode: Win a series of single player matches and face an unforgiving final encounter
  • Training mode: Hone your skills and combos at your own pace in an open field
  • 32 unique teams from around the world
  • 3 stages with various settings

Notes
Platform supported: Windows 7+
Input supported: Xinput (Xbox One/Series Controller recommended), Keyboard

data.short_description: Compete with your friends in an exciting new style of Soccer! Dazzle your fans and confuse your foes all with the press of a button! From the ground or high in the sky, strike and win the day!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512MB RAM and Webgl enabled
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 4096MB RAM and Webgl enabled
